description: Create a trading partner link between an organization and a partner.
permissions: User must be able to see both the organization and partner via their respective policies; creation is permitted for admins, organization broker branch members, or organization managers.
side_effects: Creates a trading partner link record.
validation_notes: --organization and --partner are required. Both must be in Type|ID format. Organization type must be Broker or Customer. Partner type must be Customer, Broker, Trucker, or MaterialSite. Organization and partner are required relationships on the server.

flags.name: --organization
flags.description: Organization in Type|ID format (Broker or Customer)
flags.validation: Type|ID format; type must be Broker or Customer.

flags.name: --partner
flags.description: Partner in Type|ID format (Customer, Broker, Trucker, MaterialSite)
flags.validation: Type|ID format; type must be Customer, Broker, Trucker, or MaterialSite.
